stage-content-right-top\">\n<h2>embedded world: Curtains up for Basler!</h2>\n<p>Basler's premiere at this year's embedded world in Nuremberg was a great success. The live demos with our partners National Instruments, xylon and Inforce proved a strong visitor draw — and the bratwurst robot from FZI, of course! Our tradeshow recap video shows you other highlights and impressions from this leading international tradeshow for embedded systems.</p>\n<a href=\"\" class=\"button call-to-action-trigger\" tabindex=\"-1\">See the tradeshow highlights now!</a>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"video-container\" data-width=\"980\" data-height=\"550\">\n<div data-video-id=\"bqQDgULdm34\" data-type=\"youtube\"></div>\n</div>\n</li><li class=\"slide slick-slide slick-current slick-active\" data-interchange=\" ['/fp-1492611008/media/editorial/stage_homepage/small_750x704px/CMOS_750x704px.jpg', only screen and (max-width: 667px) and (orientation: portrait)], ['/fp-1492611008/media/editorial/stage_homepage/medium_1536x600px/CMOS_1536x600px.jpg', only screen and (max-width: 667px) and (orientation: landscape)], ['/fp-1492611008/media/editorial/stage_homepage/medium_1536x600px/CMOS_1536x600px.jpg', only screen and (min-width: 668px) and (orientation: portrait)], ['/fp-1492611008/media/editorial/stage_homepage/large_3840x1140px/CMOS_3840x1140px.jpg', only screen and (min-width: 668px) and (orientation: landscape)], ['/fp-1492611008/media/editorial/stage_homepage/large_3840x1140px/CMOS_3840x1140px.jpg', only screen and (min-width: 1025px)] \" data-slick-index=\"0\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;/fp-1492611008/media/editorial/stage_homepage/large_3840x1140px/CMOS_3840x1140px.jpg&quot;); width: 785px;\" aria-hidden=\"false\" tabindex=\"-1\" role=\"option\" aria-describedby=\"slick-slide00\">\n<div class=\"container\">\n<a href=\"/en/support/downloads/document-downloads/white-paper-camera-module-for-embedded-vision-system/\" class=\"bg-btn\" tabindex=\"0\"></a>\n<div class=\"content col-left empty\"></div>\n<div class=\"content col-right \">\n<div class=\"half stage-content-right-top\">\n<h2>Camera Modules for Embedded Systems: Make or Buy?</h2>\n<p>Make or Buy? Should I buy a camera module for my embedded vision system, or opt for sensor integration in-house? Our White Paper explores the advantages and disadvantages of both approaches.</p>\n<a class=\"button cta-button\" title=\"Read the White Paper\" href=\"/en/support/downloads/document-downloads/white-paper-camera-module-for-embedded-vision-system/\" tabindex=\"0\">Read the White Paper</a>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</li><li class=\"slide slick-slide\" data-interchange=\" ['/fp-1491567758/media/editorial/stage_homepage/small_750x704px/Stage_Small_Website_Relaunch_750x704px_V2.jpg', only screen and (max-width: 667px) and (orientation: portrait)], ['/fp-1491566077/media/editorial/stage_homepage/medium_1536x600px/Stage_Medium_Website_Relaunch_1536x600px.jpg', only screen and (max-width: 667px) and (orientation: landscape)], ['/fp-1491566077/media/editorial/stage_homepage/medium_1536x600px/Stage_Medium_Website_Relaunch_1536x600px.jpg', only screen and (min-width: 668px) and (orientation: portrait)], ['/fp-1491573522/media/editorial/stage_homepage/large_3840x1140px/Webside_Relaunch_3840x1140px.jpg', only screen and (min-width: 668px) and (orientation: landscape)], ['/fp-1491573522/media/editorial/stage_homepage/large_3840x1140px/Webside_Relaunch_3840x1140px.jpg', only screen and (min-width: 1025px)] \" data-slick-index=\"1\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;/fp-1491573522/media/editorial/stage_homepage/large_3840x1140px/Webside_Relaunch_3840x1140px.jpg&quot;); width: 785px;\" aria-hidden=\"true\" tabindex=\"-1\" role=\"option\" aria-describedby=\"slick-slide01\">\n<div class=\"container\">\n<div class=\"content col-left empty\"></div>\n<div class=\"content col-right \">\n<div class=\"half stage-content-right-top\">\n<h2>We've Updated Our Website <br> for You</h2>\n<p>The Basler website has a fresh new look. But the changes reach well beyond the surface. The underlying technology has been optimized as well. Have a look around and discover the various ways that we've improved the new Basler website for you! </p>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</li><li class=\"slide slick-slide\" data-interchange=\" tabindex=\"-1\" role=\"option\" aria-describedby=\"slick-slide03\">\n<div class=\"container\">\n<a href=\"\" class=\"bg-btn\" tabindex=\"-1\"></a>\n<div class=\"content col-left empty\"></div>\n<div class=\"content col-right \">\n<div class=\"half stage-content-right-top\">\n<h2>Basler pylon for Embedded Vision</h2>\n<p>Developing a vision system for an embedded solution is very different than for standard PCs. Different, however, does not necessarily mean difficult. Tom discovers that the Basler pylon Programming Interface makes software development for an embedded system a lot easier than expected. </p>\n<a href=\"\" class=\"button call-to-action-trigger\" tabindex=\"-1\">Watch how pylon helps Tom succeed!</a>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"video-container\" data-width=\"980\" data-height=\"550\">\n<div data-video-id=\"lPbqNjkdCik\" data-type=\"youtube\"></div>\n</div>\n</li><li class=\"slide contains-video slick-slide\" data-interchange=\" ['/fp-1491401922/media/editorial/stage_homepage/small_750x704px/Stage_Small_Embedded_World_750x704px-3.jpg', only screen and (max-width: 667px) and (orientation: portrait)], ['/fp-1491401922/media/editorial/stage_homepage/medium_1536x600px/Stage_Medium_Embedded_World_1536x600px-2.jpg', only screen and (max-width: 667px) and (orientation: landscape)], ['/fp-1491401922/media/editorial/stage_homepage/medium_1536x600px/Stage_Medium_Embedded_World_1536x600px-2.jpg', only screen and (min-width: 668px) and (orientation: portrait)], ['/fp-1490938841/media/editorial/stage_homepage/large_3840x1140px/Stage_Large_Embedded_World_booth_3840x1140px.jpg', only screen and (min-width: 668px) and (orientation: landscape)], ['/fp-1490938841/media/editorial/stage_homepage/large_3840x1140px/Stage_Large_Embedded_World_booth_3840x1140px.jpg', only screen and (min-width: 1025px)] \" data-slick-index=\"4\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;/fp-1490938841/media/editorial/stage_homepage/large_3840x1140px/Stage_Large_Embedded_World_booth_3840x1140px.jpg&quot;); width: 785px;\" aria-hidden=\"true\" tabindex=\"-1\" role=\"option\" aria-describedby=\"slick-slide04\">\n<div class=\"container\">\n<a href=\"\" class=\"bg-btn\" tabindex=\"-1\"></a>\n<div class=\"content col-left empty\"></div>\n<div class=\"content col-right dark\">\n<div class=\"half stage-content-right-top\">\n<h2>embedded world: Curtains up for Basler!</h2>\n<p>Basler's premiere at this year's embedded world in Nuremberg was a great success. The live demos with our partners National Instruments, xylon and Inforce proved a strong visitor draw — and the bratwurst robot from FZI, of course! Our tradeshow recap video shows you other highlights and impressions from this leading international tradeshow for embedded systems.</p>\n<a href=\"\" class=\"button call-to-action-trigger\" tabindex=\"-1\">See the tradeshow highlights now!</a>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"video-container\" data-width=\"980\" data-height=\"550\">\n<div data-video-id=\"bqQDgULdm34\" data-type=\"youtube\"></div>\n</div>\n</li><li class=\"slide slick-slide slick-cloned\" data-interchange=\" ['/fp-1492611008/media/editorial/stage_homepage/small_750x704px/CMOS_750x704px.jpg', only screen and (max-width: 667px) and (orientation: portrait)], ['/fp-1492611008/media/editorial/stage_homepage/medium_1536x600px/CMOS_1536x600px.jpg', only screen and (max-width: 667px) and (orientation: landscape)], ['/fp-1492611008/media/editorial/stage_homepage/medium_1536x600px/CMOS_1536x600px.jpg', only screen and (min-width: 668px) and (orientation: portrait)], ['/fp-1492611008/media/editorial/stage_homepage/large_3840x1140px/CMOS_3840x1140px.jpg', only screen and (min-width: 668px) and (orientation: landscape)], ['/fp-1492611008/media/editorial/stage_homepage/large_3840x1140px/CMOS_3840x1140px.jpg', only screen and (min-width: 1025px)] \" data-slick-index=\"5\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;/fp-1492611008/media/editorial/stage_homepage/large_3840x1140px/CMOS_3840x1140px.jpg&quot;); width: 785px;\" aria-hidden=\"true\" tabindex=\"-1\">\n<div class=\"container\">\n<a href=\"/en/support/downloads/document-downloads/white-paper-camera-module-for-embedded-vision-system/\" class=\"bg-btn\" tabindex=\"-1\"></a>\n<div class=\"content col-left empty\"></div>\n<div class=\"content col-right \">\n<div class=\"half stage-content-right-top\">\n<h2>Camera Modules for Embedded Systems: Make or Buy?</h2>\n<p>Make or Buy? Should I buy a camera module for my embedded vision system, or opt for sensor integration in-house? Our White Paper explores the advantages and disadvantages of both approaches.</p>\n<a class=\"button cta-button\" title=\"Read the White Paper\" href=\"/en/support/downloads/document-downloads/white-paper-camera-module-for-embedded-vision-system/\" tabindex=\"-1\">Read the White Paper</a>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</li></div></div>\n\n\n\n\n<button type=\"button\" data-role=\"none\" class=\"slick-next slick-arrow\" aria-label=\"Next\" role=\"button\" style=\"display: disabled\">\n<span>Find Product</span>\n</a>\n</form>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</section>\n<div class=\"container content-shadow\">\n<div class=\"content\">\n<a id=\"markets_quick_access\" name=\"markets_quick_access\"></a>\n<div class=\"industry-solutions type1\">\n<h2 class=\"title\">Industry-specific Solutions</h2>\n<p>Industrial and network cameras for applications in industry, medicine, traffic and retail.</p>\n<div class=\"slider-wrapper multiple-items\">\n<ul class=\"slider slick-initialized slick-slider\"><button type=\"button\" data-role=\"none\" class=\"slick-prev class=\"startpage_text\">\n<h1>Industrial Cameras from Basler — The Right Camera for Your Application</h1>\n<p>As one of the leading developers and manufacturers of industrial cameras and high-quality digital cameras for <a title=\"applications\" href=\"/en/markets/\">applications</a> in the fields of <a title=\"Factory Automation\" href=\"/en/markets/factory-automation/\">Factory Automation</a>, <a title=\"Medical &amp; Life Sciences\" href=\"/en/markets/medical-and-life-sciences/\">Medical &amp; Life Sciences</a>, <a title=\"Intelligent Traffic Systems (ITS)\" href=\"/en/markets/traffic-and-transportation/\">Intelligent Traffic Systems (ITS)</a> and <a title=\"Retail\" href=\"/en/markets/retail/\">Retail</a>, Basler looks back on more than 25 years of experience and expertise in the Vision Technology field.</p>\n<a class=\"arrow-link\" title=\"You can find more information about Basler industrial cameras here\" href=\"/en/products/industrial-cameras/\">You can find more information about Basler industrial cameras here</a>\n</div>\n</div>\n<span></span>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</main>\n<!-- // END MAIN
